title:
Camera Comparison: Nokia Lumia 1020 vs Galaxy S4, iPhone 5, Lumia 925, One
Do we need to say anything...

attachments.displayName:
Camera Comparison: Nokia Lumia 1020 vs Galaxy S4, iPhone 5, Lumia 925, One
Do we need to say anything at all here? The Lumia 1020 is the clear winner with that enormous 41MP PureView camera that manages to capture even the finest of finest of detail. Throw its
lossless zoom capabilities into the deal and it becomes simply unbeatable in this category. As expected, the GS4 and the iPhone 5 can't quite match the 1020, but are still admirable performers.
http://metropcsphones.net/products/nokia-lumia-1020-review/
